topics.body:
"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f5a7f6368726cc53c0200#post_539f5a7f6368726cc53c0200
That's true, and it's why I adore the people I know.
They'll never see this, but I love my friends as if they were my brothers and if I can make my sister laugh, the day is a success.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539f5b0d6368726a94a60200#post_539f5b0d6368726a94a60200
Well that's good, shows your coping mechanisms are improving and getting stronger.

I would like to just get it out here that every time any of us says some corny joke or posts an image that I either don't comment on or comment in a 'freaking-out' kind of way, I pretty much always at least chuckle or at least nod thoughtfully at everything, so hopefully I never make anyone feel like they didn't get the approval they wanted.
topics.author: 4fde0c7e945b706cc30003eb

topics.body:
Also, you know who else I adore?
You guys. All of you.
I'm not a My Little Pony fan, in fact I'm rather indifferent to it. However I come here every day because you guys are just such a delight to share a joke with and talk to.
